com.jrefinery.chart
Class VerticalBarPlot3D

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.jrefinery.chart.Plot
        |
        +--com.jrefinery.chart.BarPlot
              |
              +--com.jrefinery.chart.VerticalBarPlot
                    |
                    +--com.jrefinery.chart.VerticalBarPlot3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
AxisChangeListener, CategoryPlot, ChartChangeListener, VerticalValuePlot
public class VerticalBarPlot3D
extends VerticalBarPlot

A general class for plotting vertical bars with a 3D effect, using data from any class that implements the CategoryDataset interface.

This class now relies on a renderer to draw the individual bars, giving some flexibility to change the visual representation of the data.

See Also:
Plot, CategoryDataset, VerticalBarRenderer

VerticalBarPlot3D

public VerticalBarPlot3D(Axis horizontal,
                         Axis vertical,
                         java.awt.Insets insets,
                         double introGap,
                         double trailGap,
                         double categoryGap,
                         double seriesGap)
                  throws AxisNotCompatibleException,
                         PlotNotCompatibleException
Standard constructor: returns a BarPlot with attributes specified by the caller.
Parameters:
horizontal - The horizontal axis.
vertical - The vertical axis.
introGap - The gap before the first bar in the plot.
trailGap - The gap after the last bar in the plot.
categoryGap - The gap between the last bar in one category and the first bar in the next category.
seriesGap - The gap between bars within the same category.
